name: Intenuum
tag_list: tv, smartphones, app, iphone, android, meego, interactive-advertising, semantic-search, social-tv, smarttv, social-media, product-placement
overview:
Since it was founded in 2009, Intenuum has been dedicated to bringing together social media and TV to create a truly interactive experience on all levels. Intenuum continues to bring forth Web 3.0 products and services designed for variety of media platforms - all with the specific objective of turning TV viewers from passive participants into active participants.
